channel.title: Apparmor errors on booting
channel.description:
When starting Gateway and Workstation, I always have 1 error statement ending with red "failed!".
for example: .. apparmor="STATUS" operation="profile_load" name="/usr/{sbin/traceroute,bin/traceroute.db} .. failed!
but also .. apparmor="STATUS" operation="profile_load" name="usr/sbin/dovecot" ... failed! or .. usr/sbin/mdnsd ... failed! or .. usr/sbin/identd ... failed! or .. usr/sbin/managesieve-login ... failed!
Is it some security, privacy problem?

item.title: Apparmor errors on booting
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
[quote=“Luisjf, post:1, topic:666”]Patrick I have this same problem whe I boot both virtual machines.
After the red written ‘‘failed!’’ Pc stops, doesen’t work.
After a few minutes I can see ‘‘Aborted’’ on both virtual machines (workstation and Gatwey)
You think is it a prolem of virtual machine or not?
I cheked the pgp key …[/quote]
Unrelated here. Moved here:
https://www.whonix.org/forum/index.php/topic,745.0.html

Read full topic

item.title: Apparmor errors on booting
item.dc:creator: felipe
item.description:
When starting Gateway and Workstation, I always have 1 error statement ending with red “failed!”.

for example:
… apparmor=“STATUS” operation=“profile_load” name="/usr/{sbin/traceroute,bin/traceroute.db} …
failed!

but also
… apparmor=“STATUS” operation=“profile_load” name=“usr/sbin/dovecot” … failed!
or
… usr/sbin/mdnsd … failed! or
… usr/sbin/identd … failed! or
… usr/sbin/managesieve-login … failed!

Is it some security, privacy problem?

Read full topic
